About Us

Wicklow's Furniture Specialists Since 1944

Since 1944, Slaneyside has been the trusted furniture supplier for Wicklow families and businesses. We understand the unique needs of Wicklow homes and offer the perfect solutions for every room.

Why Wicklow Homes Choose Us:

  • Free delivery throughout County Wicklow
  • Wide range of furniture perfect for Wicklow homes
  • Expert advice for Wicklow's unique homes
  • Trusted by Wicklow families for generations

Serving All of Wicklow:

From the coastal towns of Bray and Greystones to the picturesque villages of Rathdrum and Ashford, we deliver quality furniture throughout the Garden County. Whether you're in busy Wicklow Town or peaceful Baltinglass, we've got you covered.

Wicklow Home Expertise:

We understand Wicklow homes - from coastal properties to mountain cottages, from modern apartments in Bray to traditional homes in Arklow. Our team can help you choose furniture that suits your Wicklow home perfectly.

Frequently Asked Questions - Wicklow

Do you deliver to all areas of Wicklow?

Yes! We deliver to every town and village in County Wicklow. This includes Wicklow Town, Bray, Greystones, Arklow, Rathdrum, Ashford, Blessington, Baltinglass, and all surrounding areas.

Is delivery really free in Wicklow?

Absolutely! We offer free delivery on all furniture items throughout County Wicklow. There are no hidden charges for Wicklow delivery.

How long does delivery take to Bray/Greystones?

For Bray, Greystones, and surrounding areas, most in-stock items are delivered within 5-7 working days. For more specific delivery times, please contact us.

Can I visit your showroom from Wicklow?

Yes! Our showroom in Enniscorthy is easily accessible from all parts of Wicklow. We're approximately 1 hour from Bray, 45 minutes from Wicklow Town, and 30 minutes from Arklow.

Do you offer assembly in Wicklow?

Yes, our delivery team can assemble your furniture upon delivery anywhere in Wicklow. This service is available for beds, wardrobes, and larger furniture items.

What if I live in a remote part of Wicklow?

We deliver to even the most remote parts of Wicklow. Whether you're in the mountains or by the coast, we'll get your furniture to you. Contact us for specific delivery queries.
